title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         The Eastern National giftshop at Pea Ridge National Military Park. NPS Photo  The museum store, located in the Pea Ridge National Military Park Museum and Visitor Center, is your first stop for books, DVD's, tape tours, postcards and other items that will help with your visit to the Pea Ridge battlefield and make it a memory to last.  The store also offers a variety of books on the Civil War and other areas of interest in the Northwest Arkansas and Southwest Missouri area. The store is open during regular visitor center hours and operated in partnership by Eastern National. Be sure to also check out our online store at eParks.com. For further information please address all inquires to: Pea Ridge National Military Park  Eastern National 15930 E. Hwy 62 Garfield, AR 72732 Or call at:  479-451-8122 x 238
